verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 35 And the angel answered her, “The Holy Spirit will come upon you, and the power of the Most High will overshadow you; therefore the child to be born will be called holy—the Son of God.
verses.kjv: 35 And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.
verses.niv: 35 The angel answered, "The Holy Spirit will come upon you, and the power of the Most High will overshadow you. So the holy one to be born will be called the Son of God.

verses.esv:
7   I will tell of the decree:
  The LORD said to me, “You are my Son;
    today I have begotten you.
verses.kjv: 7 I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.
verses.niv: 7 I will proclaim the decree of the LORD: He said to me, "You are my Son; today I have become your Father.

verses.esv: 20 And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding, so that we may know him who is true; and we are in him who is true, in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.
verses.kjv: 20 And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
verses.niv: 20 We know also that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding, so that we may know him who is true. And we are in him who is true--even in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 14 For all who are led by the Spirit of God are sons of God.
verses.kjv: 14 For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, they are the sons of God.
verses.niv: 14 because those who are led by the Spirit of God are sons of God.

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 30 I and the Father are one.”
verses.kjv: 30 I and my Father are one.
verses.niv: 30 I and the Father are one."

verses.esv: 14 And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, and we have seen his glory, glory as of the only Son from the Father, full of grace and truth.
verses.kjv: 14 And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
verses.niv: 14 The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us. We have seen his glory, the glory of the One and Only, who came from the Father, full of grace and truth.

verses.esv: 3 He is the radiance of the glory of God and the exact imprint of his nature, and he upholds the universe by the word of his power. After making purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high,
verses.kjv: 3 Who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;
verses.niv: 3 The Son is the radiance of God's glory and the exact representation of his being, sustaining all things by his powerful word. After he had provided purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty in heaven.

verses.esv: 18 This was why the Jews were seeking all the more to kill him, because not only was he breaking the Sabbath, but he was even calling God his own Father, making himself equal with God.
verses.kjv: 18 Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him, because he not only had broken the sabbath, but said also that God was his Father, making himself equal with God.
verses.niv: 18 For this reason the Jews tried all the harder to kill him; not only was he breaking the Sabbath, but he was even calling God his own Father, making himself equal with God.

verses.esv: 33 And those in the boat worshiped him, saying, “Truly you are the Son of God.”
verses.kjv: 33 Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him, saying, Of a truth thou art the Son of God.
verses.niv: 33 Then those who were in the boat worshiped him, saying, "Truly you are the Son of God."

verses.esv:
6   For to us a child is born,
    to us a son is given;
  and the government shall be upon his shoulder,
    and his name shall be called
  Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God,
    Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.
verses.kjv: 6 For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
verses.niv: 6 For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

verses.esv: 31 but these are written so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God, and that by believing you may have life in his name.
verses.kjv: 31 But these are written, that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God; and that believing ye might have life through his name.
verses.niv: 31 But these are written that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God, and that by believing you may have life in his name.

verses.esv: 6 yet for us there is one God, the Father, from whom are all things and for whom we exist, and one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom are all things and through whom we exist.
verses.kjv: 6 But to us there is but one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we in him; and one Lord Jesus Christ, by whom are all things, and we by him.
verses.niv: 6 yet for us there is but one God, the Father, from whom all things came and for whom we live; and there is but one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom all things came and through whom we live.

verses.esv:
5 For to which of the angels did God ever say,

  “You are my Son,
    today I have begotten you”?

Or again,

  “I will be to him a father,
    and he shall be to me a son”?
verses.kjv: 5 For unto which of the angels said he at any time, Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee? And again, I will be to him a Father, and he shall be to me a Son?
verses.niv: 5 For to which of the angels did God ever say, "You are my Son; today I have become your Father "? Or again, "I will be his Father, and he will be my Son"?

verses.esv: 18 No one has ever seen God; the only God, who is at the Father’s side, he has made him known.
verses.kjv: 18 No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
verses.niv: 18 No one has ever seen God, but God the One and Only,, who is at the Father's side, has made him known.

verses.esv: 14 I will be to him a father, and he shall be to me a son. When he commits iniquity, I will discipline him with the rod of men, with the stripes of the sons of men,
verses.kjv: 14 I will be his father, and he shall be my son. If he commit iniquity, I will chasten him with the rod of men, and with the stripes of the children of men:
verses.niv: 14 I will be his father, and he will be my son. When he does wrong, I will punish him with the rod of men, with floggings inflicted by men.

verses.esv: 4 The Nephilim were on the earth in those days, and also afterward, when the sons of God came in to the daughters of man and they bore children to them. These were the mighty men who were of old, the men of renown.
verses.kjv: 4 There were giants in the earth in those days; and also after that, when the sons of God came in unto the daughters of men, and they bare children to them, the same became mighty men which were of old, men of renown.
verses.niv: 4 The Nephilim were on the earth in those days-and also afterward-when the sons of God went to the daughters of men and had children by them. They were the heroes of old, men of renown.

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

verses.esv: 19 For the creation waits with eager longing for the revealing of the sons of God.
verses.kjv: 19 For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God.
verses.niv: 19 The creation waits in eager expectation for the sons of God to be revealed.

verses.esv: 24 God is spirit, and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth.”
verses.kjv: 24 God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
verses.niv: 24 God is spirit, and his worshipers must worship in spirit and in truth."

verses.esv: 38 the son of Enos, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.
verses.kjv: 38 Which was the son of Enos, which was the son of Seth, which was the son of Adam, which was the son of God.
verses.niv: 38 the son of Kenan, the son of Enosh, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.

verses.esv: 6 Now there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the LORD, and Satan also came among them.
verses.kjv: 6 Now there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the LORD, and Satan came also among them.
verses.niv: 6 One day the angels came to present themselves before the LORD, and Satan also came with them.

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
